column3: We can merge anytime.  It will only impact a few, until release.\n
Did you check to make sure there are no blocks before block 279,000 with a timestamp after the timestamp of the checkpoint, and there is no block after with a timestamp before?\n
@Michagogo, @gavinandresen, just recently I was thinking about this but the timestamp requirements scared me off. Why don't we make a program that automatically checks the timestamp requirements? \n
@bardiharborow Yes such as script would be useful, please do\n
ACK. Numbers are correct, and timestamps around block 279000 are strictly increasing.\n
@gavinandresen I see that @sipa already mentioned it, but yes, I did check that before putting this block in the PR. (that's what I was referring to in the commit message for ~~ffb5e48~~ e7906d1)\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/6873cfb6c0efaeb645ef0a7074651623bb4bec82 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Ok, block 279,000 is confirmed by 2206 blocks as of the time of writing. Are we ready to merge?\n
